verses.roman:
keha yena ei bali' nā kare nindana
sei yukti kaha, yāte rahe dui dharma

synonyms: keha—anyone; yena—so that; ei—this; bali'-saying; nā kare—does not do; nindana—blasphemy; sei—that; yukti—consideration; kaha—tell Me; yāte—by which; rahe—remain; dui—two; dharma—duties.
translation: "Make some arrangement so that I may not leave you and at the same time people may not blame Me for remaining with relatives after taking sannyāsa."
